title: Cursor changes in game problem
body:
Hello!

For some reason, when I'm playing in game, my LoL gold finger randomly switches to the normal cursor and if i click it tabs out of my game randomly. 

Is anyone else having this problem or is it only me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is usually caused by applications running in the background that take priority over league for whatever reason.

You should try running in windowed fullscreen rather than fullscreen, or close any other applications that you don't need while running league.
